text: James Brian Logue (born March 25, 1939) is an American former ice hockey goaltender and Olympian. Logue played with Team USA at the 1968 Winter Olympics held in Grenoble, France. He previously played for the Boston College Eagles. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic ice hockey players of the United States Category:Ice hockey people from Massachusetts Category:Boston College Eagles men's ice hockey players Category:People from Melrose, Massachusetts Category:American men's ice hockey goaltenders
title: James Logue (ice hockey)
